Header: Essentialpharmaceutical drugs under price control increased from 73 to 100
Content: Minister RajithaSenaratne has said that the number of essential pharmaceutical drugs that have been brought under price control will be increased from 73 to 100. The Minister further said that the State Pharmaceuticals Corporation has registered a profit of up to 1982 million rupees. Minister RajithaSenaratne was speaking at a function organized with respect to Dr. H.M.M. Rumi assuming duties as the new Chairman of the State Pharmaceuticals Corporation. The new Executive Director of the Corporation Dr. Wilfred Kumarasiri also assumed duties on the occasion.
